name: Herb Plucker
desc: Inflicts "Panacea" on enemy targets when they enter battle: When "Dewdrop" breaks, charges the attacked target's "Panacea" by 5% of the Dewdrop's charge, up to 100% of the sum of all characters' Max HP. At the start of the enemy target's turn, consumes the Charge value, deals Wind DoT equal to 200% base DMG, and restores all allies' HP by 5% of Max HP. For every Charge value that equals 1% of the sum of all characters' Max HP, increases this DMG by 8% and the restored HP amount by 4%.
